type: TS LF Trading Bot Warning - Simulating - Slippage Added

definition.text: Slippage Amount was calculated based on the Session Configuration and substracted from the Order Rate in order to have the Actual Rate. It was added because what we had was a Market Buy Order.

paragraphs.text: This is normal behaviour you should not worry about. This warning is created in order to let you know that this happened and help you track the details of each trade.
The following are the values of variables at the time this warning was created. They might be useful for you to understand what exactly happened.
